original: Netti
analyzed: na itti

original: Paṭiniddesavāra
analyzed: paṭiniddesa vāra

original: Vibhaṅga 5
analyzed: vibhaṅga

original: Lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅga
analyzed: lakkhaṇa hāra vibhaṅga

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: “Vuttamhi ekadhamme”ti, ayaṁ lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: vuttamhi eka dhamme ti ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Kiṁ lakkhayati?
analyzed: kim lakkhayati

original: Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ekasmiṁ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: ye dhammā eka lakkhaṇā tesam dhammānam ekasmin dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhāḥ dhammāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Yathā kiṁ bhave?
analyzed: yathā kim bhave

original: Yathāha bhagavā—
analyzed: yathā āha bhagavān

original: “Cakkhuṁ, bhikkhave, anavaṭṭhitaṁ ittaraṁ parittaṁ pabhaṅgu parato dukkhaṁ byasanaṁ calanaṁ kukkuḷaṁ saṅkhāraṁ vadhakaṁ amittamajjhe”.
analyzed: cakkhu bhikkhave anavaṭṭhitam ittaram parittam pabhaṅgu paratas dukkham byasanam calanam kukkuḷam saṅkhāram vadhakam amitta majjhe

original: Imasmiṁ cakkhusmiṁ vutte avasiṭṭhāni ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vuttāni bhavanti.
analyzed: imasmin cakkhusmin vutte avasiṭṭhāni ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vuttāni bhavanti

original: Kena kāraṇena?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena

original: Sabbāni hi cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇāni.
analyzed: sabbāni hi cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vadhaka ṭṭhena eka lakkhaṇāni

original: Yathā cāha bhagavā—
analyzed: yathā ca āha bhagavān

original: “Atīte, rādha, rūpe anapekkho hohi, anāgataṁ rūpaṁ mā abhinandi, paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipajja”.
analyzed: atīte rādha rūpe anapekkhaḥ hohi anāgatam rūpam mā abhinandi paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipajja

original: Imasmiṁ rūpakkhandhe vutte avasiṭṭhā khandhā vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: imasmin rūpa kkhandhe vutte avasiṭṭhāḥ khandhāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Kena kāraṇena?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena

original: Sabbe hi pañcakkhandhā yamakovādasutte vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā vuttā.
analyzed: sabbe hi pañca kkhandhā yamakovāda sutte vadhaka ṭṭhena eka lakkhaṇā vuttā

original: Yathā cāha bhagavā—
analyzed: yathā ca āha bhagavān

original: “Yesañca susamāraddhā,
analyzed: su samāraddhā

original: niccaṁ kāyagatāsati;
analyzed: niccam kāya gata asati

original: Akiccaṁ te na sevanti,
analyzed: a kiccam te na sevanti

original: kicce sātaccakārino”.
analyzed: kitce sā tacca kārinaḥ

original: Iti kāyagatāya satiyā vuttāya vuttā bhavanti vedanāgatā sati cittagatā dhammagatā ca.
analyzed: iti kāya gatāya satiyā vuttāya vuttāḥ bhavanti vedanā gatā sati citta gatā dhamma gatā ca

original: Tathā yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā mutaṁ vāti vutte vuttaṁ bhavati viññātaṁ.
analyzed: tathā yam kiñci diṭṭham vā sutam vā mutam vā iti vutte vuttam bhavati viññāta

original: Yathā cāha bhagavā—
analyzed: yathā ca āha bhagavān

original: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ”.
analyzed: tasmāt iha tvam bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: “Ātāpī”ti vīriyindriyaṁ, “sampajāno”ti paññindriyaṁ, “satimā”ti satindriyaṁ, “vineyya
analyzed: ātāpī iti vīriya indriya sampajānoti paññā indriya satimā ati satindriya vineyya

original: loke abhijjhādomanassan”ti samādhindriyaṁ, evaṁ kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro
analyzed: loke abhijjhā domanassanti samādhi indriye evam kāye kāya anupassinaḥ viharato cattāraḥ

original: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Kena kāraṇena, ekalakkhaṇattā catunnaṁ indriyānaṁ.
analyzed: kena kāraṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā catunnam

original: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāraḥ iddhipādāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañcindriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcasu
analyzed: catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañca indriyāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti pañcasu

original: indriyesu bhāviyamānesu pañca balāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcasu balesu bhāviyamānesu
analyzed: indriyesu bhāviyamānesu pañca balāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti pañcasu balesu bhāviyamānesu

original: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, sattasu bojjhaṅgesu bhāviyamānesu ariyo
analyzed: satta bojjhaṅgāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti sattasu bojjhaṅgesu bhāviyamānesu ariyaḥ

original: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati, sabbeva bodhaṅgamā dhammā bodhipakkhiyā
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati sabbe iva bodhaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ bodhi pakkhiyā

original: bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Kena kāraṇena, sabbe hi bodhaṅgamā bodhipakkhiyā neyyānikalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā, te ekalakkhaṇattā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: kena kāraṇena sabbe hi bodhaṅgamāḥ bodhi pakkhiyāḥ neyyānika lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā te eka lakkhaṇa ttā bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Evaṁ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam akusalāḥ api dhammāḥ eka lakkhaṇa ttā pahānam abbhattham gacchanti

original: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu vipallāsā pahīyanti, āhārā cassa pariññaṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu vipallāsā pahīyanti āhārā ca ssa pariññam gacchanti

original: upādānehi anupādāno bhavati, yogehi ca visaṁyutto bhavati, ganthehi ca vippayutto
analyzed: upādānehi anupādānaḥ bhavati yogehi ca visayuttaḥ bhavati ganthehi ca vippayuttaḥ

original: bhavati, āsavehi ca anāsavo bhavati, oghehi ca nitthiṇṇo bhavati, sallehi ca visallo
analyzed: bhavati āsavehi ca anāsavaḥ bhavati oghehi ca nitthiṇṇaḥ bhavati sallehi ca visallaḥ

original: bhavati, viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo cassa pariññaṁ gacchanti, agatigamanehi na agatiṁ gacchati,
analyzed: bhavati viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ cassa pariññam gacchanti agati gamanehi na agatim gacchati

original: evaṁ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam akusalāḥ api dhammāḥ eka lakkhaṇa ttā pahānam abbhattham gacchanti

original: Yattha vā pana rūpindriyaṁ desitaṁ, desitā tattheva rūpadhātu rūpakkhandho rūpañcāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: yattha vā pana rūpa indriyam desita desitā tattha iva rūpa dhātu rūpa kkhandhaḥ

original: Yattha vā pana sukhā vedanā desitā, desitaṁ tattha sukhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ dukkhasamudayo ca ariyasaccaṁ.
analyzed: yattha vā pana sukhā vedanā desitā desitam tattha sukha indriyam somanassa indriyam dukkha samudayo ca ariya sat ca

original: Yattha vā pana dukkhā vedanā desitā, desitaṁ tattha dukkhindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ dukkhañca ariyasaccaṁ.
analyzed: yattha vā pana dukkhā vedanā desitā desitam tattha dukkha indriyam domanassa indriyam dukkham ca ariya sat ca

original: Yattha vā pana adukkhamasukhā vedanā desitā, desitaṁ tattha upekkhindriyaṁ sabbo ca paṭiccasamuppādo.
analyzed: yattha vā pana adukkham asukhā vedanā desitā desitam tattha upekkhindriyam sabbaḥ ca paṭiccasamuppādo

original: Kena kāraṇena, adukkhamasukhāya hi vedanāya avijjā anuseti.
analyzed: kena kāraṇena adukkham asukhāya hi vedanāya avijjā anuseti

original: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ, nāmarūpapaccayā
analyzed: avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇa viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpa nāma rūpa paccayā

original: saḷāyatanaṁ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā,
analyzed: saḷāyatana saḷāyatana paccayā phassaḥ phassa paccayā vedanā vedanā paccayā taṇhā

original: taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṁ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṁ
analyzed: taṇhā paccayā upādāna upādāna paccayā bhavaḥ bhava paccayā jāti jāti paccayā jarā maraṇa

original: sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
analyzed: soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā sambhavanti evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ hoti

original: So ca sarāgasadosasamohasaṅkilesapakkhena hātabbo, vītarāgavītadosavītamohaariyadhammehi hātabbo.
analyzed: so ca sa rāga sa dosa sa moha saṅkilesa pakkhena hātabbaḥ vīta rāga vīta dosa vīta moha ariya dhammehi hātabbaḥ

original: Evaṁ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato ca cutūpapātato ca, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ekasmiṁ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: evam ye dhammā eka lakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato ca cutūpapātato ca tesam dhammānam ekasmin dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhāḥ dhammāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “vuttamhi ekadhamme”ti.
analyzed: tena āha āyasmā mahākaccāyanaḥ vuttamhi eka dhamma iti

original: Niyutto lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: niyuttaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāro
